detaileddescription.para: Drop packets with unknown source MAC. Do not learn. Do not forward
Do not learn unknown source MAC. Forward based on destination MAC
Hardware learning. Learn source MAC. Forward based on destination MAC
Trap packets with unknown source MAC to CPU. Do not learn. Do not forward
Trap packets with unknown source MAC to CPU. Do not learn. Forward based on destination MAC

briefdescription.para: Notify unknown source MAC using FDB callback.

detaileddescription.para: Do not learn in hardware. Do not forward. When a packet from unknown source MAC comes this mode will trigger a new learn notification via FDB callback for the MAC address. This mode will generate only one notification per unknown source MAC to FDB callback.
Port or LAG or System Port

briefdescription.para: Associated Port or LAG object id.

detaileddescription.para: The CPU port is not a member of any bridge.

briefdescription.para: Tagging mode of the bridge port.

detaileddescription.para: Specifies the tagging mode to be used during egress.
Please note that for SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_1Q_ROUTER, all vlan interfaces are auto bounded for the bridge port.

simplesect.title: Condition:
simplesect.para: @@condition SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_SUB_PORT or SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_1D_ROUTER or SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE == SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_TUNNEL

briefdescription.para: Maximum number of learned MAC addresses.
Action for packets with unknown source MAC address when FDB learning limit is reached.

detaileddescription.para: Before removing a bridge port, need to disable it by setting admin mode to false, then flush the FDB entries, and then remove it.

briefdescription.para: Ingress filtering (drop frames with unknown VLANs)
Egress filtering (drop frames with unknown VLANs at egress)

detaileddescription.para: Packets ingressing on the bridge port should not be forwarded to the members present in the isolation group.The isolation group type should SAI_ISOLATION_GROUP_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT.

briefdescription.para: Bridge port counter IDs in sai_get_bridge_port_stats() call.

detaileddescription.para: When setting sub-ports to broadcast or unknown multicast flood, it also includes flooding to the router. When setting sub-ports to unknown unicast flood, it does not include flooding to the router

briefdescription.para: Flood on all sub-ports and L2MC group.

detaileddescription.para: Flood on all sub-ports, without the router In addition, flood on the supplied L2MC group

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for unknown unicast, unknown multicast and broadcast flood controls.
List of bridge ports associated to this bridge.
Maximum number of learned MAC addresses.

detaileddescription.para: Zero means learning limit is disabled.

briefdescription.para: To disable learning on a bridge.

detaileddescription.para: Provides control on the set of bridge ports on which unknown unicast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_BRIDGE_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_BRIDGE_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP. When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled. Valid for SAI_BRIDGE_TYPE_1D.

Provides control on the set of bridge ports on which unknown multicast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_BRIDGE_ATTR_UNKNOWN_MULTICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_BRIDGE_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP.When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled. Valid for SAI_BRIDGE_TYPE_1D.

Provides control on the set of bridge ports on which broadcast packets need to be flooded. This attribute would be used only when the SAI_BRIDGE_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE is set as SAI_BRIDGE_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_L2MC_GROUP.When this attribute's value is SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID, then flooding would be disabled. Valid for SAI_BRIDGE_TYPE_1D.

briefdescription.para: Bridge counter IDs in sai_get_bridge_stats() call.
